ScenarioDef.label: Rox Knight
ScenarioDef.description:
The call of adventure beckoned, a siren's song that I could not ignore. Bound by duty, yet yearning for more, my heart longed for the thrill of the unknown and the promise of uncharted territories. Leaving the comfort of my lord's halls, I set forth into the rugged highlands, eager to forge my own path.
My armor bears the mark of House Roxmont, but now it shields a knight errant. The wilds are filled with bandits and hidden monsters, ever watchful for a lone traveler. The nights are cold and fraught with danger, each shadow a potential threat. Still, the thrill of the unknown drives me forward, far from the comfort of my lord’s halls.
With a pouch of silver and a heart yearning for adventure, I march on. Perhaps I will find glory in distant lands, build a reputation that echoes through the ages, and gather comrades who share my quest. Yet for now, the path is uncertain and perilous.
For now, the journey itself is my reward.

scenario.summary: One lone rox knight with a good supply of roberry stout.

li.text: The grand feasts, lavish tournaments, and courtly pleasures were never enough for you. You longed for more—the grit and consequence of true adventure, like the bards sing of in ancient tales. You yearned to know what real challenge and danger feel like. \n\nNow, after years of preparation and training, you're venturing into the untamed wilderness. Real perils and glory await you.
